=== Instructors ===
<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/32pixel/32crystalpeople.png]]</nowiki> Instructors are people who are actively offering courses through the Education Focus Group. The people have volunteered their time to provide training to Ubuntu users on a broad range of topics.

Instructors can use any of the following to deliver content:
* IRC
* Wiki Pages
* Forum Posts

The Education Focus Group is always looking for instructors. If you are interested in being an instructor please contact cprofitt:
* IRC - #ubuntu-learning on irc.freenode.net
* Ubuntu Forums - cprofitt Member <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/member.php?u=257622|#257622]]</nowiki>
